summary: The 'Carnivals are Real Entertainment Act' aims to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act. It seeks to provide nonimmigrant status (P-visa) to 'mobile entertainment workers,' specifically those involved in the operation of carnivals and related services traveling seasonally. This includes workers involved in the transportation, assembly, operation, and maintenance of carnival attractions. The bill also outlines program requirements and mandates the Secretaries of Homeland Security and Labor to establish rules within a year of enactment.
